abstract: Facebook has been rumored to be for sale for a long time, yet no deal has been signed. Why? According to one of the social networking site’s backers, it’s because potential suitors are lowballing offers.
snippet: Facebook has been rumored to be for sale for a long time, yet no deal has been signed. Why? According to one of the social networking site’s backers, it’s because potential suitors are lowballing offers.

headline.main: Facebook Backer: Suitors Far Too Low
